title: Deadline to apply for 2021 O/L exams, extended
content: The time frame granted to submit applications for the 2021 GCE Ordinary Level Examination has been extended to the 17th of February, stated the Examination Commissioner. Previously, the deadline was set for 10 February. Accordingly, it is possible to submit the application form online or by accessing the official mobile application of the Department of Examinations.
